Title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
Actors: Ben Browder, Claudia Black, Anthony Simcoe, Gigi Edgley
Plot: When a full-scale war is engaged by the evil Scarran Empire, the Peacekeeper Alliance has but one hope: reassemble human astronaut John Crichton, once sucked into the Peacekeeper galaxy through a wormhole. Crichton's task: Get the entire Peacekeeper race to safety before the last war of an era brings and end to the universe.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins.
